title: Head and neck cancer. The problem.
summary: Advanced carcinomas that involve the head and neck present a major therapeutic challenge because of their poor prognosis, the frequently associated medical problems of the patients, and the adverse effect of treatment on oral and pharyngeal function. Collaboration a â€¦
abstract: Advanced carcinomas that involve the head and neck present a major therapeutic challenge because of their poor prognosis, the frequently associated medical problems of the patients, and the adverse effect of treatment on oral and pharyngeal function. Collaboration and communication of multidisciplinary teams have had a profound effect on the treatment of head and neck cancer.
